overview: Nikita and Ludovic are a loving couple. They are married and parents. Their sex life is fulfilled. To spice up their naughty evenings, they invite men to libertine with them. Ludovic regularly proposes Sapphic scenarios to his wife. Worried that he might turn away from her, Nikita refuses. She takes advice from her friends and gradually develops a scenario that will surprise her husband.
title: Never Without You
